thread.title: Rose on whether he'll be ready to play opening night: 'Who knows?''
thread.title_full: Rose on whether he'll be ready to play opening night: 'Who knows?''

title: Rose on whether he'll be ready to play opening night: 'Who knows?''
text:
2:34p ET 
The Bulls are likely sick and tired of the injury questions surrounding Derrick Rose , and exactly when he'll be physically able to return to the team's starting lineup. 
But thanks to a fractured orbital bone he suffered during the very first practice of the season, they're back once again. 
Rose spoke to reporters for the first time since the incident occurred following Thursday's practice, but said that his availability for opening night against the Cavaliers on Oct. 27 still remains in question. true — K.C. Johnson (@KCJHoop) October 15, 2015 Rose said "who knows" when asked if he'll be ready for Opening Night. — K.C. Johnson (@KCJHoop) October 15, 2015 Rose confirms Gibson's elbow broke bone. — K.C. Johnson (@KCJHoop) October 15, 2015 MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our NBA newsletters.
